ssd8.socket.http

类 HttpClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • ssd8.socket.http.HttpClient

  • public class HttpClient
extends java.lang.Object
    Class HttpClient is a class representing a simple HTTP client.
    作者:
    wben

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      private byte[] buffer
      Response is stored in a byte array.
      private static int buffer_size
      Allow a maximum buffer size of 8192 bytes
      private static java.lang.String CRLF
      String to represent the Carriage Return and Line Feed character sequence.
      private java.lang.StringBuffer header
      StringBuffer storing the header
      (专用程序包) java.io.BufferedInputStream istream
      Input stream from the socket.
      (专用程序包) java.io.BufferedOutputStream ostream
      Output stream to the socket.
      private static int port
      default HTTP port is port 80
      private static int PORT
      Default port is 80.
      private java.lang.StringBuffer response
      StringBuffer storing the response.
      (专用程序包) java.net.Socket socket
      My socket to the world.

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明

      Close all open connections -- sockets and streams.

      connect connects to the input host on the default http port -- port 80.

      Get the response header.
      java.lang.String getResponse()
      Get the server's response.

      processGetRequest process the input GET request.
      void processPutRequest(java.lang.String request)
      processPutRequest process the input PUT request.

      processResponse process the server response.

    • 方法详细资料

      • connect

        public void connect(java.lang.String host)
             throws java.lang.Exception
        connect connects to the input host on the default http port -- port 80. This function opens the socket and creates the input and output streams used for communication.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception
